bookSourceComment: vip章节请登录后更新目录
loginUrl:
<js>
 function getCode(){
 	 let app_signature_md5 = "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94";
  	let phone = result.get("账号");
  	let time = String(Date.now());	
  	
   let hashvalue = java.md5Encode(encode(phone+time));	
   let option = {
 	  "app_signature_md5":app_signature_md5,
   "app_version":"4.1.1",
   "channel":"default",
   "verify_type":"5", 
   "hashvalue":hashvalue,
   "username":phone,
   "timestamp":time
   }
   
   let body = "secret_content="+encode(JSON.stringify(option));
   let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/send_verify_code"
   try{
 let resposebody =	java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify({"method":"POST","body":body}));
 	let tip = JSON.parse(decode(resposebody)).tip;
 	java.toast(tip)
 	}catch(e){
 		java.log(e)
 		}
 	
 	}
 
 
 	
 function login(){
 	try{
 	let login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号")
let code=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码");
    let jsonStr = {
    	"app_signature_md5":"f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
    	"app_version":"4.1.1",
    	"channel":"default",
    	"uuid":"android",
    	"ver_code":code,
    	"username":login_name
    	}
    
    
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/verify_login," + JSON.stringify(option);
    
   let respbody = decode(java.ajax(url));
   java.log(respbody);
   let resp = JSON.parse(respbody);
   java.log(resp.tip);
   
   
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('❗️ ' + resp.tip + ' ❗️')
    }
    }catch(e){
    	java.log(e)
    	}
}
</js>

ruleExplore.author: $.author_name
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
response=null
if(!baseUrl.match(/localhost|get_daily/)){
	
category_type=baseUrl.match(/category_type=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_type=(\d+)/)[1]:""
order=baseUrl.match(/order=(.+?)&/)?baseUrl.match(/order=(.+?)&/)[1]:""
is_paid=baseUrl.match(/is_paid=(\d)&/)?baseUrl.match(/is_paid=(\d)&/)[1]:""
up_status=baseUrl.match(/up_status=(\d)&/)?baseUrl.match(/up_status=(\d)&/)[1]:""
jsonObj={"category_type":category_type,"app_signature_md5":"f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94","app_version":"2.1.6","channel":"default","order":order,"count":"15","is_paid":is_paid,"page":String(baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]-1),"up_status":up_status,"login_token":String(getToken()),"account":String(getA())}
//java.log(JSON.stringify(jsonObj))
option={"method":"POST","body":"secret_content="+encodeURIComponent(encode(JSON.stringify(jsonObj)))}
url="https://app.shubl.com/bookcity/get_filter_search_book_list,"+JSON.stringify(option)
response=decode(java.ajax(url))
}else{
jsonObj={"app_signature_md5":"f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94","app_version":"2.1.6","channel":"default","task_type":"1","login_token":String(getToken()),"account":String(getA())}
option={"method":"POST","body":"secret_content="+encodeURIComponent(encode(JSON.stringify(jsonObj)))}
url="https://app.shubl.com/reader/get_daily_task_bonus,"+JSON.stringify(option)
response=decode(java.ajax(url));
java.toast(JSON.parse(response).tip)
}

// 打印解密结果
java.log(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(response)))
response
</js>
